title: To Me, the One Who Loved You
overview: Koyomi Hidaka and Shiori Sato meet at his fatherâ€™s research center and begin to fall in love, but so do their parents, who eventually marry. To avoid becoming stepsiblings, they decide to run away to a parallel universe. Traveling between dimensions is common in their world, but not without repercussions. Does a universe exist for the young couple, and what will it cost them to find it?
